title: anyone recognize this balloon looking font?
content:
all i was given was a xerox copy from a digitizer  
and I cant find this anywhere!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422064732im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bunker-babes_5873.jpg)

 [‹ New York Times Magazine Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422064732/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39558 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 1960s/70s The Omega Man - Rubens {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422064732/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2613 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marisa

comments.content: The [URW/DTC-verison](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422064732/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/dtc-brody-variants/) has a lot of variants in style
